thread.title: Northwestern's Harry Hall is Week 6 LVL Colonial League Offensive MVP
thread.title_full: Northwestern's Harry Hall is Week 6 LVL Colonial League Offensive MVP

title: Northwestern's Harry Hall is Week 6 LVL Colonial League Offensive MVP
text:
Harry Hall , Northwestern Lehigh 
Hall became the all-time leading rusher in Northwestern Lehigh history with 191 yards and two touchdowns in a 30-21 defeat of Salisbury on Friday. He now has 4,332 career rushing yards. 
Hallâ€™s two TDs against the Falcons give him 49 for his career, tying him with current Northwestern head coach Josh Snyder for second all-time for the Tigers. 
Brad Wilson may be reached at bwilson@lehighvalleylive.com . Follow him on Twitter @bradwsports. Find Lehigh Valley high school sports on Facebook.
